Sub: 
Installation of  Perimeter Intrusion Security system  at  all  Hyper-sensitive  
airports. 
 
 
In terms of MCA letter no. AV-13024/27/2003-SS dated 13-07-2006 regarding 
the minutes of the meeting taken by MOS(CA) on 12-07-2006, AAI and the concerned  
Airport Operators shall  take immediate necessary action to install  Perimeter Intrusion 
Security System at all Hyper-sensitive airports. In phase one it should be installed at 
Mumbai, Kolkata, Delhi , Chennai, Bangalore and Hyderabad airports immediately.  
 
Specifications for the Perimeter Intrusion Security System shall be communicated 
to the airport operators by the   BCAS within 6 weeks.  
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
